# GKLeaderboard.PlayerScope.friendsOnly

**Case**

Loads only data for friends of the local player.

## Declaration

```swift
case friendsOnly
```

## Constants

- **GKLeaderboard.PlayerScope.global**: Loads data for all players of the game.
